name: Pixelated Hell PROTOTYPE
description:
Lost in a Mineshaft...

The player finds themself in the bottom of a mineshaft... full of monsters... The player must travel through the mines in hope of escaping.

The more limbs you have determine how much you can attack and how much health you have so pay attention to the player's body.

CONTROLS

WASD - move
Left mouse button - Shoot pellet
Right mouse button - Convert limb into pellets or 4 pellets into health
Escape - Pause
F11 - Toggle fullscreen
F2 - Screenshot (can only have one)

DIFFICULTY

Easy - Regain a pellet if under 4 every 5 seconds; pellets home onto enemies
Medium - Only homing pellets
Hard - Living hell, the way the game was meant to be played

Made for Brackeys Game Jam: Stronger Together
